posts.post_content:
1910 T213/T206 Coupon Billy Campbell. PSA 2. Only one graded by PSA. 
$1000

1911-1916 T216 Kotton Jeff Sweeney. SGC 10.
$250

Not the best scans I know, but basically Campbell looks solid for the grade while Sweeney is a typical SGC 10 (if there is such a thing).

I have eclectic interests on the trading front, but generally I'm interested in Louisiana issues, D issues, tough rookie cards, and rare backs. And hesitant to trade for anything more common than what I'm trading.
